Pre-Game Insights: India will bank on Bhuvneshwar Kumar's experience in the absence of Jasprit Bumrah.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar is shaping well and will be an important cog in India's wheel during the series.
Bhuvneshwar's experience and ability to bowl in different phases of the match will come good and handy for the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bhuvneshwar Kumar is known to bowl miserly in the death overs especially in the IPL for SunRisers Hyderabad.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar will be crucial for India in the T20 World Cup where experienced bowlers will be needed.
